name: Version Industries
description:
Founded in London in 2003 and opening a New York office in 2005, Version Industries is a leading boutique graphic and web design agency, providing full-stack solutions to websites ranging from deeply abstract, conceptual projects to beautiful, clean e-commerce and heavy-duty corporate websites.
We are a small, nimble agency focused on creating award-winning exceptional design and translating that into highly polished and intuitive websites. Â We provide services from the first concept through branding, print design, and full development and execution of the online presence. We do not build using templates and we always strive to make the results delivered as true as possible to the original vision, so that the work stands out in a crowded space.
